problem_names:
lemma finite_total_preorder_on_iff' [simp]:
  "finite_total_preorder_on alts R \<longleftrightarrow> total_preorder_on alts R"

lemma pref_profile_wfI' [intro?]:
  "(\<And>i. i \<in> agents \<Longrightarrow> total_preorder_on alts (R i)) \<Longrightarrow>
   (\<And>i. i \<notin> agents \<Longrightarrow> R i = (\<lambda>_ _. False)) \<Longrightarrow> is_pref_profile R"

lemma is_pref_profile_update [simp,intro]:
  assumes "is_pref_profile R" "total_preorder_on alts Ri'" "i \<in> agents"
  shows   "is_pref_profile (R(i := Ri'))"

lemma maximal_imp_preferred:
  "x \<in> alts \<Longrightarrow> Max_wrt R \<subseteq> preferred_alts R x"
translations:
lemma finite_total_preorder_on_iff' [simp]:
  "finite_total_preorder_on alts R \<longleftrightarrow> total_preorder_on alts R"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. finite_total_preorder_on alts R = total_preorder_on alts R

lemma pref_profile_wfI' [intro?]:
  "(\<And>i. i \<in> agents \<Longrightarrow> total_preorder_on alts (R i)) \<Longrightarrow>
   (\<And>i. i \<notin> agents \<Longrightarrow> R i = (\<lambda>_ _. False)) \<Longrightarrow> is_pref_profile R"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<And>i.
                i \<in> agents \<Longrightarrow>
                total_preorder_on alts (R i);
     \<And>i.
        i \<notin> agents \<Longrightarrow>
        R i = (\<lambda>_ _. False)\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> is_pref_profile R

lemma is_pref_profile_update [simp,intro]:
  assumes "is_pref_profile R" "total_preorder_on alts Ri'" "i \<in> agents"
  shows   "is_pref_profile (R(i := Ri'))"

proof (prove)
using this:
  is_pref_profile R
  total_preorder_on alts Ri'
  i \<in> agents

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. is_pref_profile (R(i := Ri'))

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. election agents alts

context
  fixes R assumes R: "total_preorder_on alts R"
begin

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. total_preorder_on alts R

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. finite
     {x \<in> alts. \<forall>y\<in>alts. R x y \<longrightarrow> R y x}

lemma maximal_imp_preferred:
  "x \<in> alts \<Longrightarrow> Max_wrt R \<subseteq> preferred_alts R x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<in> alts \<Longrightarrow> Max_wrt R \<subseteq> preferred_alts R x

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>?x \<in> alts; ?y \<in> alts\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> R ?x ?y \<or> R ?y ?x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<in> alts \<Longrightarrow> Max_wrt R \<subseteq> preferred_alts R x
